page.title: 10Entertainment
page.content: We have to move out of our area if we wish to go to the cinema or to the theatre.The nearest cinema,called the Classic,is in Crosby but we sometimes go to Liverpool or Southport to see a film or a show. {Local entertainment}is popular.Adults can go to working mens clubs,ex-service mens clubs,community centres and church clubs where they can play bingo,dance,listen to music (live-groups or a disco),eat and drink,attend club meetings etc..Children can attend youth clubs,community centres and church clubs.Morris Dancing is a very popular activity for children and many troupes actually compete in local and national carnivals and festivals. A survey in our area revealed that about 40% of the households have a video and hire films for about Â£1.
